articles.title: DPRK Will Bolster Up War Deterrent: Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Bolster Up War Deterrent: Spokesman
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Friday blasting the U.S. for disclosing its attempt to intensify military provocations disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity:
					 The U.S. president at a recent summit of the U.S., Japan and south Korea held in Hague openly justified the on-going joint military exercises, disclosing his provocative intention to further intensify them.
					
					 The danger of a war on the Korean peninsula is increasing obviously due to the U.S. massive introduction of aggression forces and destructive weapons and its ceaseless madcap maneuvers for a nuclear war.
					
					 It is a vicious strategic scenario of the U.S. to bar detente on the Korean peninsula created thanks to our sincere efforts and prevent the inter-Korean relations from being mended through such military provocations in a bid to deliberately escalate tensions and invent a pretext for arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The joint military exercises for aggression staged by the U.S. in south Korea and in its vicinity with nuclear war hardware involved several times every year are, indeed, the most vivid expression of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Facts go to prove that a series of commitments made by the U.S. that it has no hostile intent toward the DPRK are a sheer lie.
					
					 The U.S. had better fulfill its commitments, not taking issue with others for no reason.
					
					 The U.S. is describing its joint military exercises aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" in other country as "defensive" and "regular ones" while terming regular drills of the DPRK army in its land "provocations". This is not workable on anyone.
					
					 The U.S. insistence on such logic would only compel the DPRK to develop all its steps for bolstering up its war deterrent and demonstrating it into more annual and regular processes.

articles.title: KPA Will Never Pardon Gangsterism of S. Korean Military Warmongers: Spokesman for KPA General Staff
articles.content:
KPA Will Never Pardon Gangsterism of S. Korean Military Warmongers: Spokesman
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that a speed boat flotilla belonging to the second fleet of the south Korean navy illegally intruded into the waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea and forcibly seized a peaceable fishing boat of the DPRK on Thursday night:
					 22 HP fishing boat "539-52456" belonging to the Ongjin Fishery Station lost its route due to engine breakdown when it was engaged in regular fishing in the waters near Mahap Islet in Ongjin County on Thursday night.
					
					 As there was thick sea fog, sailors of the boat dropped an anchor and was judging direction with a compass.
					
					 Suddenly unidentified warships appeared and encircled the fishing boat, firing more than 50 bullets.
					
					 Speed boats belonging to the second fleet of the south Korean navy crossed the maritime military demarcation line and intruded into the territorial waters of our side all of a sudden.
					
					 The gangsters stormed the fishing boat that had its engine barely repaired, beat our sailors with iron sticks, making them fall in a faint. Then they shackled and blindfolded the sailors and began taking the boat to Paekryong Island.
					
					 What matters is that the gangsters threw an iron hook at the peaceable boat that went adrift after losing its route and seized the boat by force although its sailors stated that they did not want to surrender.
					
					 Even the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea formally admitted in an official notice sent to the DPRK that the boat was a peaceable fishing boat and normal navigation was not possible due to an engine trouble and that the sailors had no idea of submission.
					
					 However, the gangsters of the south Korean navy separated our sailors and forced submission upon them with guns leveled at them on the island.
					
					 The KPA General Staff sized up the situation and sent an emergency warning notice through the north-south military hotline on the west coast at 22:20 on Thursday, urging the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea to immediately send back the fishing boat and warning that in case the return of the boat is delayed, that will entail unpredictable consequences.
					
					 It, at the same time, took a military countermeasure of immediately dispatching patrol ships of the KPA to the waters where the incident occurred.
					
					 Much upset by this, the group of gangsters belonging to the second fleet of the south Korean navy told lies and made excuses that our fishing boat "illegally crossed the northern limit line" and that they seized the boat because it did not respond to several warnings. It was compelled to hurriedly notify the KPA of the time and place of handover.
					
					 As a result, at 01:28 on Friday, our sailors could come back to the motherland aboard the fishing boat.
					
					 The sailors have not yet come back to their senses but are still in coma due to the shuddering barbaric atrocities committed by the gangsters who forced submission on them. 
					
					 The DPRK side will take various measures to prevent abnormal incidents from happening to all fishing boats engaged in fishing in sensitive waters.
					
					 But we will never overlook the inhumane and monstrous atrocities committed by the south Korean military warmongers by forcibly seizing the fishing boat and committing gangster-like crimes against its crew.
					
					 The KPA will certainly force the group of gangsters of the south Korean navy to pay a dear price for their shuddering atrocities.

articles.title: Chongryon Denounces Tokyo District Court's Unreasonable Decision
articles.content:
Chongryon Denounces Tokyo District Court's Unreasonable Decision
Tokyo, March 26 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a news conference at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on March 25 to denounce the Tokyo District Court's move to seize Chongryon's facilities. 
					 At the news conference Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, made public a statement. 
					
					 The statement recalled that the Tokyo District Court unreasonably de-listed a company of Mongolia, as the highest tenderer at the auction of the land and building of the Central Headquarters of Chongryon, and issued a decision to allow the sale to the Marunaka Holdings Co. Ltd., Japan in an exceptional manner on March 24. 
					
					 This was an unprecedented tyrannical action of openly revealing the discrimination of the Japanese judicial authorities and an intolerable hostile act against the DPRK as it was aimed to seize the Korean Hall at any cost in disregard of the law of Japan, judicial precedents and practices of sale procedures, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The decision of the judicial authorities was made owing to the undisguised discriminating measure taken without any consideration of the noble mission the Korean Hall has performed to protect the life and rights of Koreans in Japan and promote Korea-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia. It will never escape from the denunciation by the peoples of Korea and Japan but lay a stumbling block in the way of mending the Korea-Japan relations. 
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon strongly demands the Tokyo District Court cancel at once the illegal decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Company
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Managing Director of Chinese Company
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the managing director of the Leting Zhonglian Coal Trading Co., Ltd. of China on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned on Thursday by Managing Director Zhang Junsheng.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Beninese Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Beninese Organization
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Mathieu Kerekou Foundation of Benin.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Benin on March 19 by President of the Socialist Party of Benin Ali Houdou who is general secretary and spokesman for the foundation.

articles.title: Russian VIPs Leave
articles.content:
Russian VIPs Leave
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East who is chairman of the Russian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia, and his party left here on Friday.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation headed by V.V. Grishkov, first secretary of the committee, arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Satellite Scientists Street
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Satellite Scientists Street
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction of Satellite Scientists Street.
					 Looking round various places of the construction site, the premier learned about in detail the progress of the project and encouraged the builders.
					
					 There took place a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 The meeting underscored the importance of the project and took measures to ensure the supply of materials.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Enraged at S. Korea's Provocations
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Enraged at S. Korea's Provocations
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK are now enraged at the recent leaflet scattering the south Korean authorities committed again to slander the dignity of its supreme leadership and social system.
					 Pak Song, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 Such reckless action by the south Korean military gangsters can never be pardoned as it is the most serious case that viciously infringed on the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					 Worse still, they conducted the scattering of leaflets for an insult to the sacred dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, our life and soul, from the five islands in the West Sea of Korea, the biggest hotspot where the two sides are standing in acute military confrontation. Perhaps they are dying to feel what our army's missile strike is like.
					
					 Though the north-south relations and peace are precious to us, we can never show slightest mercy to the provocateurs who dared insult the dignity of our supreme leadership.
					
					 Give us an attack order to wipe out at once the group of heinous gangsters from the earth.
					
					 Ri Chol Bom, a student of the Global Environment Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities talked nonsense about "freedom of speech" after letting human scum and right-wing conservatives scatter anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 They have the impudence to call for "confidence" and "peace" while committing such hideous act of insulting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and its social system.
					
					 Their reckless action is a mockery of all the fellow countrymen ardently wishing for the improved north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not be pardoned as they reneged on the north-south agreement on putting an end to the smear campaign, not content with the anti-DPRK nuclear war rehearsals launched together with foreign forces.
					
					 The students and younger generations in the DPRK are of the view that they can never go together under the same sky with such provocateurs.

articles.title: Possibility of Sinking of Cheonan Warship by Torpedo Totally Dismissed
articles.content:
Possibility of Sinking of Cheonan Warship by Torpedo Totally Dismissed
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Korean scientist in the U.S., expert on anti-submarine warfare, at a press conference held on Mar. 25 dismissed the claim that the south Korean Cheonan warship sank by a torpedo four years ago, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 He held there was almost no possibility of the Cheonan warship being sunk by a torpedo just as he claimed in the past.
					
					 It was unprecedented in the history of naval battle that a torpedo exploded under waters, sinking the warship, not by directly hitting it, he insisted, and went on:
					
					 The report had no evidence to scientifically clarify its sinking by a torpedo.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. ambassador in Seoul was skeptical about the report and a foreign investigation group suggested the possibility of the warship's sinking by a mine, etc. Many other people did not believe in the conclusion made by the south Korean investigation group.
					
					 In a nutshell, the report is politically biased as it produced no scientific evidence. He expressed belief that truth was bound to be probed.

articles.title: Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Tree planting in spring is progressing apace across the country.
					 More than 60 million trees have been planted so far in over 10 000 hectares of land across the country from early in March.
					
					 Chongdan, Unryul and other counties in South Hwanghae Province planted many trees of good species such as Larix leptolepis and pine-nut trees.
					
					 Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province planted more than 1.89 million trees of good species in over 300 hectares during over 20 days.
					
					 Sunchon and Kaechon cities and Pakchon County and other cities and counties in North and South Phyongan provinces qualitatively planted trees along roads and hillsides.

articles.title: People Excited to Watch Performance Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
People Excited to Watch Performance Given by Moranbong Band
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band is giving its performance at the April 25 House of Culture before full house every day. 
					 Service personnel and people from all walks of life were excited to watch its performance characterized by its unique, dynamic and innovative music representation and cheerful rhythms.
					
					 Pak Ho Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 I was mesmerized by the performance given by the Moranbong Band. 
					
					 It was more exciting as it was given when the whole country was pervaded with the spirit of the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The performance is instilling more intense loyalty into all service personnel and people and stirring up their enthusiasm. 
					
					 Cha Ok Hui, a woman in Pongnam-dong of Phyongchon District, Pyongyang said she wanted to dance with the singers on the stage when the charming and cheerful melody of the "Song of a Big Haul of Fish" resounded forth. 
					
					 Jang Myong Ho, an official of the National Heritage Protection Guidance Bureau, said that he realized the might of arts powerful enough to give full play to the inexhaustible mental power of all service personnel and people. 
					
					 Kim Chang Il, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said that the performance made his heart burn with the zeal as it was distinct in its ideological stand and strong in agitation and appeal. 
					
					 Jang Chol, an engineer at the Meari Sounder Company, said that the Moranbong Band represents the honor of the present era as it is the first-line unit of buglers dynamically steering the on-going general advance.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the successful inheritance and development of Kimilsungism, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an immortal revolutionary idea as leader Kim Jong Il faithfully carried forward the ideological and theoretical wealth of Kimilsungism and developed it in depth as required by the era and the revolutionary development. 
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great idea which faithfully carried forward the historic mission, essence and system enunciated by Kimilsungism.
					
					 The historic mission of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is to achieve the final victory of the popular masses' cause of independence and completely realize their independence as is the case with Kimilsungism.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism regards the Juche idea as its starting point and basis of its principle because Kimilsungism considers it as its quintessence.
					
					 It has an integral system of idea, theory and method in its system.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism means the development of Kimilsungism at a higher stage.
					
					 Thanks to the distinguished feats Kim Jong Il performed by developing in depth Kimilsungism as required by the era and the revolutionary development, our party members and people have called the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and recognized it as our party's guiding idea by combining the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is shedding its brilliant rays as the immortal revolutionary idea that represents and steers the 21st century thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. Department of Defense made public a report on "quadrennial defense review" in which it said the DPRK's plan of long-range missiles and development of nuclear weapons posed a "great threat" to peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and "escalated threat" to the U.S. as well.  In other words, it means that the DPRK is a disturber of peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday comments that it is none other than the U.S. that threatens peace and stability and escalates the tension in the peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 Citing the reasons why Pentagon provoked the DPRK again in the report on "quadrennial defense review", the commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is set to deploy 60 percent of its naval forces in the Asia-Pacific region by 2020. To do this it needs an excuse. Therefore, Pentagon let loose the out-of-date and stereotyped theory of the DPRK's "threat and provocation".
					
					 The DPRK is the first target of the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy pursued by the U.S.
					
					 The primary task of the U.S. is to rid the DPRK of its nuclear deterrence. The U.S. is well aware that it can never evade harsh retaliation from the DPRK in case it provokes a nuclear war against the latter.
					
					 Pentagon said in the report that the U.S. meets greater challenge in defending the mainland due to the DPRK's "ballistic missiles".
					
					 The DPRK is not a big country and it has no buffer zone.
					
					 The commentary terms the U.S. a shameless villain as it talks about "threat and provocation" from the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Scattering Anti-DPRK Leaflets
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Scattering Anti-DPRK Leaflets
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military hooligans fired bullets and shells from the areas around the five islands including Paekryong and Big Yonphyong islands and scattered leaflets malignantly slandering the DPRK on March 24.
					 The spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea in a statement on Thursday denounced such reckless actions as hideous provocative acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and a blatant challenge to the desire and wish of all Koreans for the peace of the country and improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The leaflet scattering operation staged in the hottest spot was a deliberate and premeditated confrontation racket against the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This clearly proves that "confidence" and "peace" touted by the south Korean authorities are no more than rhetoric to cover up their true colors as confrontation maniacs and mislead the public opinion at home and abroad and sophism of traitors, a group of war maniacs opposed to national reconciliation and improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The working class in the DPRK will thoroughly implement the party's new line of developing the two fronts simultaneously, each holding more tightly a hammer in one hand and a rifle in the other, and thus fully demonstrate their heroic spirit in building a thriving nation and defending socialism and wipe out the enemies challenging the dignity of its supreme leadership and its social system to the last one.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop at once their smear campaign going against the agreement reached between the north and the south and the desire of the fellow countrymen and behave themselves, bearing deep in mind the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their DPRK-targeted madcap war exercises being staged with the U.S.

articles.title: Serious Condition for Upbringing in S. Korea Deplored
articles.content:
Serious Condition for Upbringing in S. Korea Deplored
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Parents for Genuine Upbringing in Pusan, south Korea held a press conference at the plaza of the Pusan City Office on March 25 as regards the serious condition for upbringing, according to the south Korean Internet paper Voice of People.
					 At the press conference speakers denounced the upbringing institutions of south Korea for burdening parents with various kinds of expenses.
					
					 The parents know well that this is an illegal act, but they are yielding to such demand for fear that their failure to cover the expenses would adversely affect their children, they deplored.
					
					 In this regard, media are laying bare the wrongdoings of the upbringing institutions, they said, adding:
					
					 The regime should take measures for the upbringing institutions. We will continue wage an action to this end.

articles.title: Halt to War Maneuvers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to War Maneuvers Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- 49 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People's Action for Achieving Peace against War and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a press conference in denunciation of the war exercises for aggression outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Mar. 26, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The speakers said the Ssangryong drills expected to begin on Mar. 27 was the largest-ever landing drills with military hardware five times as many as the previous year involved.
					
					 They added that these war drills were staged in the past with main emphasis on attack from sea but they would be three-dimensional landing ones this year with airborne infiltration operation supplemented to assert their offensive nature.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the military confrontation would be further escalated on the Korean Peninsula if such drills are allowed to go on, they warned.
					
					 They demanded the south Korean and the U.S. authorities stop the Ssangryong drills at once and come out for negotiations for peace on the peninsula.
					
					 They staged a demonstration at the end of the press conference.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Drop Old Way of Thinking: Statement
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Drop Old Way of Thinking: Statement
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public a statement titled "Let us drop old way of thinking of distrust and confrontation and open up a new era of reconciliation and co-existence in spirit of By Our Nation Itself" on March 20. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The climate for reconciliation and peace was created on the Korean peninsula and a new era of reunification started after the joint declarations were adopted between the north and the south. However, the pro-U.S. regime came to power in south Korea, bringing the situation to confrontation again. 
					
					 From the outset of the year the north side called for paving a wide avenue for improved inter-Korean relations by concerted efforts of Koreans. 
					
					 The north and the south agreed to stop slandering each other, but conservative media in south Korea are making false reports against the north and the south side is scattering anti-DPRK leaflets. 
					
					 The statement demanded the south side have candid dialogue with the north and stop slandering and all war drills for aggression against the north.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "For an Ultimate Solution of the Rural Question under the Banner of Socialist Rural Theses" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on March 21. 
					 The work, published on February 24, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the importance of the rural question in realizing the popular masses' cause of independence and the socialist cause and the tasks and ways for finally solving the question.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on March 20.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Peru
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Lima on March 19.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and film show to praise the exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Addis Ababa on March 21.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Denmark
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Copenhagen on March 20.
					 A member of the leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Stability of  Korean Society" was posted on an internet website by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 13.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK is steadily advancing along the road of socialism free from any socio-political instability despite the stern trial of history.
					
					 It has perfect socio-political stability amid the absolute support of the people quite contrary to the western media propaganda.
					
					 Where is the key to this stability?
					
					 First, it is thanks to the guiding idea of the DPRK.
					
					 The people are the master of everything and everything serves them in this country guided by the man-centered Juche idea.
					
					 Second, it is thanks to the single-minded unity of Korean society.
					
					 The leader, the Party and the masses in the DPRK form a community united by the same destiny.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is the center of the unity in Korean society.
					
					 Third, it is thanks to the popular policies being enforced in the country.
					
					 The people deem it a due right to be provided with a stable life by the state from the date of their birth. The state regards it an obligation to ensure their living conditions and provides all rights of a social being to them including rights to work, rest and receive free education and free healthcare. This is Korean society.

articles.title: RPDC aumentara su disuasivo de guerra, subraya portavoz del MINREX
articles.content:
RPDC aumentara su disuasivo de guerra, subraya portavoz del MINREX
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos expuso su intento de seguir recrudeciendo en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno los actos de provocacion militar que vulneran la paz y la estabilidad, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 28 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					En la cumbre tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea celebrada recientemente en La Haya, el presidente norteamericano justifico abiertamente sus ejercicios militares conjuntos y se porto de modo provocativo diciendo intensificarlos mas.
					
					Hoy en dia, el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana se crea por culpa de EE.UU. que introduce en gran medida las tropas agresoras y los equipos mortiferos y libra demencial y continuamente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear.
					
					El siniestro intento estrategico de EE.UU. reside en procurar el pretexto de aumento armamentista en la region de Asia-Pacifico al impedir con tales provocaciones militares el alivio de tension de dicha peninsula y la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, que se iban logrando gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC, y al agravar intencionalmente la situacion. 
					
					Cada ano EE.UU. introdujo en varias ocasiones los equipos belicos nucleares para librar los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos en el territorio surcoreano y su contorno. Esto es la maxima expresion de su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					La realidad comprueba que fueron mentirosas las promesas hechas hasta ahora por el imperio diciendo que no tenia la voluntad hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debera ejecutar primero sus promesas lejos de acusar a otro.
					
					Justifica como "defensivos" y "normales" los ejercicios militares conjuntos que libra en el pais ajeno con objetivo de "ocupar Pyongyang", pero critica como  "provocacion" los ejercicios normales que desarrolla nuestro ejercito en su territorio propio, lo que no convencera a nadie.
					
					Cuanto mas el imperio yanqui insiste en tales teorias, tanto mas todas las medidas tomadas por la RPDC en aras de fortalecer y ostentar el disuasivo de guerra se desarrollaran anual y normalmente.  
					
					Cada ano EE.UU. introdujo en varias ocasiones los equipos belicos nucleares para librar los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos en el territorio surcoreano y su contorno. Esto es la maxima expresion de su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					La realidad comprueba que fueron mentirosas las promesas hechas hasta ahora por el imperio diciendo que no tenia la voluntad hostil anti-RPDC.

					Cuanto mas el imperio yanqui insiste en tales teorias, tanto mas todas las medidas tomadas por la RPDC en aras de fortalecer y ostentar el disuasivo de guerra se desarrollaran anual y normalmente.

articles.title: Portavoz del EMG de EPC condena pirateria de los belicistas militares surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz del EMG de EPC condena pirateria de los belicistas militares surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Por la noche del dia 27, una escuadrilla de lanchas rapidas pertenecientes a la 2a flota de las fuerzas navales del Sur de Corea incursiono ilegalmente en las aguas maritimas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Oeste de Corea y atrapo por la fuerza una embarcacion pesquera pacifica.
					En relacion con este grave incidente de provocacion, el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea dio el dia 28 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					
					Por la noche del dia 27, debido a la averia del motor, quedo desviado el barco de 22hp "539-52456" de la Empresa Pesquera de Ongjin que realizaba pescas rutinarias en las aguas cercanas al islote Mahap del distrito de Ongjin.
					
					Debido a la densa bruma, los tripulantes del barco se vieron obligados a echar anclas y determinaban la direccion usando la brujula.
					
					Entonces, aparecieron de repente unos buques de combate desconocidos que comenzaron a bloquear el barco pesquero disparando mas de 50 balas.
					
					Eran las lanchas rapidas pertenecientes a la 2a flota de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas que cruzaron por sorpresa la linea de demarcacion militar maritima de nuestra parte.
					
					Los gangsteres marineros surcoreanos irrumpieron en el barco pesquero, que logro arrancar el motor a duras penas, y golpearon con palos de hierro a nuestros tripulantes hasta desmayarlos. Luego de esposarlos y vendar sus ojos, comenzaron a remolcar el barco pesquero hacia el islote Paekryong.
					
					El problema es que esta pirateria se ha cometido intencionalmente contra nuestra embarcacion pacifica, que se habia dado a la deriva, y contra sus tripulantes que dejaron en claro que "no tiene ninguna voluntad de someterse (al Sur de Corea)".
					
					En su aviso oficial mandado a nuestra parte, la Junta de Jefes del Estado Mayor del ejercito surcoreano reconocio tambien que nuestro barco pesquero es el pacifico y no estuvo en condiciones de navegacion normal debido a su motor defectuoso y que sus tripulantes no tienen ninguna "voluntad de someterse".
					
					Sin embargo, los gangsteres surcoreanos, que llevaron nuestro barco pesquero al islote Paekryong, separaron a nuestros tripulantes y les obligaron el "sometimiento" a punta de fusiles y con la agresion fisica.
					
					Percatado de lo ocurrido, a las 22:20 del mismo dia, el Estado Mayor General del EPC exigio, por la linea de comunicacion militar N-S en la zona litoral occidental, a la Junta de Jefes del Estado Mayor del ejercito surcoreano la inmediata devolucion de nuestro barco pacifico y le envio un aviso emergente advirtiendo que en el caso de la tardanza de devolucion, se dara una situacion de imprevisible desenlace.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, tomo contramedidas militares de despachar con urgencia nuestros buques patrulleros a la zona maritima del suceso.
					
					Los perplejos gangsteres surcoreanos se vieron obligados a avisarnos la hora y el lugar de devolucion, al cabo de excusar su pirateria mintiendo que nuestro barco paso ilegalmente la "linea de limite al Norte" y lo atraparon por la fuerza porque no escucho las reiteradas advertencias.
					
					Por fin, a las 1:28 del dia 28, nuestros tripulantes y barco pudieron regresar a la patria.
					
					Debido a la horrible agresion fisica, nuestros tripulantes estan desmayados y no salen todavia de coma.
					
					Nuestra parte tomara varias medidas para que en el futuro no ocurran incidentes anormales en todos los barcos que realizan la pesca en las zonas maritimas delicadas.
					
					Pero, no pasara por alto el presente acto gangsteril de los belicistas militares surcoreanos y las vejaciones inhumanitarias y barbaras impuestas a nuestros tripulantes.
					
					Nuestro ejercito cobrara sin falta el precio de esa barbarie.

articles.title: FGSC denuncia acciones provocadoras del circulo militar del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FGSC denuncia acciones provocadoras del circulo militar del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El dia 24, los gangsteres del circulo militar del Sur de Corea dispararon fusiles y canones en los alrededores de las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea, inclusive la Paekryong y la Taeyonphyong, y esparcieron volantes de contenido insultante a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En su declaracion publicada la vispera, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea lo condeno como peor accion provocadora contra la maxima dignidad y regimen de la RPDC y desafio frontal a la aspiracion de todos los coreanos a la paz del pais y la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					El documento califica esa accion, ocurrida en la zona mas candente, de premeditada campana en busca de enfrentamiento con la RPDC, y continua:
					
					El hecho comprueba que la "confianza" y "paz", preconizadas por las autoridades surcoreanas, no pasan de ser un embuste para encubrir su naturaleza conflictiva y enganar la opinion publica interna y externa y un sofisma de los belicistas vendepatrias que no desean desde el principio la reconciliacion ni el  mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Nuestra clase obrera, que toma en una mano el martillo y el fusil en la otra, materializara cabalmente la nueva linea de nuestro partido de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y el incremento de las fuerzas nucleares, manifestara sin reservas su impetu heroico en la construccion de un Estado prospero y la defensa del socialismo y aniquilara despiadadamente a los enemigos que desafien a nuestra maxima dignidad y regimen.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben cesar de inmediato sus actos de difamacion que contravienen al acuerdo N-S y a la aspiracion de los coreanos, y actuar con prudencia conociendo bien las consecuencias catastroficas que produciran los ejercicios de guerra nuclear que libran ellas junto con Estados Unidos para agredir a la RPDC.

Kim Jong Un recibe presente de personalidad china
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio el regalo que le dirigiera Zhang Junsheng, director general de la Compania Limitada de Comercio de Carbon Leting Zhonglian de China, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo traslado el dia 27 a un funcionario coreano.

Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de Fundacion Mathieu Kerekou de Benin
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dirigiera la Fundacion Mathieu Kerekou de Benin.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de Avenida de Cientificos Wisong
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de Avenida de Cientificos Wisong
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio el campo de construccion de la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong.
					Dando revista a varios lugares se entero en detalles del estado de la obra y estimulo a los constructores.
					
					Tuvo lugar en el terreno la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de la rama interesada.
					
					En la ocasion se dio enfasis la importancia de la obra y se tomaron las medidas para suministrar suficientemente los materiales necesarios.
